presets.name: Product Promotion Shot
presets.prompt:
Create a high-impact product promotion shot optimized for TikTok and social commerce. Features:
- Hero product placement with dramatic lighting
- Clean, distraction-free background with subtle depth
- Professional color grading that emphasizes product details
- E-commerce ready composition with space for text overlays
- Scroll-stopping visual hierarchy

presets.name: Studio Ghibli Style
presets.prompt:
Create in Studio Ghibli animation style with:
- Soft watercolor aesthetics and dreamy landscapes
- Whimsical character design with expressive features
- Magical realism atmosphere with fantastical elements
- Hand-painted textures and organic brush strokes
- Nostalgic, heartwarming color palette with warm earth tones and soft pastels
- Detailed natural environments with wind and light effects

presets.name: DIY AI Figure
presets.prompt:
Create a collectible AI art figure aesthetic:
- 3D rendered figurine/action figure presentation
- Clean studio lighting with soft shadows
- Collectible toy packaging aesthetic
- Glossy/matte material contrast
- Character design with stylized proportions
- Display-ready pose and composition
- Premium collectible product photography style
